Room.Name: Milsene Museum Entrance Foyer
Room.ShortDescription: The Milsene Museum is filled with interesting objects and artifacts from around the world. You are in the main entryway to the large museum.
Room.LongDescription: The Museum branches off into four directions. To the west is the gift shoppe from where you entered. To the north, there is a small child's exhibit on lizards and other small, interesting creatures. To the east is a larger exhibit for people who are interesting in magic and other unexplainable wonders of the world. To the south, a corridor leads to even more exhibits.
